mapper.sql: epdoci.id AS consign_id,epdoci.peer_deployment_order_id AS consign_peer_deployment_order_id,epdoci.contact_name AS consign_contact_name,epdoci.contact_phone AS consign_contact_phone,epdoci.province AS consign_province,epdoci.city AS consign_city,epdoci.district AS consign_district,epdoci.address AS consign_address,epdoci.data_status AS consign_data_status,epdoci.remark AS consign_remark,epdoci.create_time AS consign_create_time,epdoci.create_user AS consign_create_user,epdoci.update_time AS consign_update_time,epdoci.update_user AS consign_update_user

epdop.id AS product_id,epdop.peer_deployment_order_id AS product_peer_deployment_order_id,epdop.peer_deployment_order_no AS product_peer_deployment_order_no,epdop.product_sku_id AS product_product_sku_id,epdop.product_unit_amount AS product_product_unit_amount,epdop.product_amount AS product_product_amount,epdop.product_sku_count AS product_product_sku_count,epdop.product_sku_snapshot AS product_product_sku_snapshot,epdop.is_new AS product_is_new,epdop.data_status AS product_data_status,epdop.remark AS product_remark,epdop.create_time AS product_create_time,epdop.create_user AS product_create_user,epdop.update_time AS product_update_time,epdop.update_user AS product_update_user

epdom.id AS material_id,epdom.peer_deployment_order_id AS material_peer_deployment_order_id,epdom.peer_deployment_order_no AS material_peer_deployment_order_no,epdom.material_id AS material_material_id,epdom.material_unit_amount AS material_material_unit_amount,epdom.material_amount AS material_material_amount,epdom.material_count AS material_material_count,epdom.material_snapshot AS material_material_snapshot,epdom.is_new AS material_is_new,epdom.data_status AS material_data_status,epdom.remark AS material_remark,epdom.create_time AS material_create_time,epdom.create_user AS material_create_user,epdom.update_time AS material_update_time,epdom.update_user AS material_update_user
mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_peer_deployment_order epdo WHERE epdo.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epdo.data_status = 1

SELECT epd_order.*
FROM ( SELECT
eap.province_name AS province_name,eac.city_name AS city_name,ead.district_name AS district_name,ep.peer_name AS peer_name,ew.warehouse_name AS warehouse_name
FROM erp_peer_deployment_order epdo LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_consign_info epdoci ON epdo.id = epdoci.peer_deployment_order_id and epdoci.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_area_province eap ON eap.id = epdoci.province LEFT JOIN erp_area_city eac ON eac.id = epdoci.city LEFT JOIN erp_area_district ead ON ead.id = epdoci.district LEFT JOIN erp_peer ep ON ep.id = epdo.peer_id AND ep.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ew ON ew.id = epdo.warehouse_position_id AND ew.data_status = 1 WHERE epdo.peer_deployment_order_no = #{peerDeploymentOrderNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epdo.data_status = 1 ) epd_order LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_product epdop ON epd_order.id = epdop.peer_deployment_order_id AND epdop.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_material epdom ON epd_order.id = epdom.peer_deployment_order_id AND epdom.data_status = 1

SELECT ,, FROM ( SELECT FROM erp_peer_deployment_order epdo WHERE epdo.peer_deployment_order_no = #{peerDeploymentOrderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND epdo.data_status = 1 )epdo LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_product epdop on epdop.peer_deployment_order_id = epdo.id and epdop.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_material epdom on epdom.peer_deployment_order_id = epdo.id and epdom.data_status=1

SELECT
eap.province_name AS province_name,eac.city_name AS city_name,ead.district_name AS district_name,ep.peer_name AS peer_name,ew.warehouse_name AS warehouse_name
FROM erp_peer_deployment_order epdo LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_consign_info epdoci ON epdo.id = epdoci.peer_deployment_order_id and epdoci.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_area_province eap ON eap.id = epdoci.province LEFT JOIN erp_area_city eac ON eac.id = epdoci.city LEFT JOIN erp_area_district ead ON ead.id = epdoci.district LEFT JOIN erp_peer ep ON ep.id = epdo.peer_id AND ep.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ew ON ew.id = epdo.warehouse_position_id AND ew.data_status = 1 WHERE epdo.peer_deployment_order_no = #{peerDeploymentOrderNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND epdo.data_status = 1

SELECT , ,, ,ew.warehouse_name,ew.warehouse_no,ep.peer_name,ep.peer_no,em.material_no,eap.province_name AS province_name,eac.city_name AS city_name,ead.district_name AS district_name FROM( select from erp_peer_deployment_order epdo where epdo.peer_deployment_order_no = #{peerDeploymentOrderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and epdo.data_status = 1 ) epdo LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_product epdop on epdop.peer_deployment_order_id = epdo.id and epdop.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_material epdom on epdom.peer_deployment_order_id = epdo.id and epdom.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_peer_deployment_order_consign_info epdoci ON epdo.id = epdoci.peer_deployment_order_id and epdoci.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_area_province eap ON eap.id = epdoci.province AND eap.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_area_city eac ON eac.id = epdoci.city AND eac.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_area_district ead ON ead.id = epdoci.district AND ead.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ew ON ew.id = epdo.warehouse_id AND ew.data_status =1 LEFT JOIN erp_peer ep ON ep.id = epdo.peer_id AND ep.data_status =1 LEFT JOIN erp_material em ON em.id = epdom.material_id AND em.data_status = 1
